title: OUR STAFF TEAM
description: Meet the core team behind Indus Realms. Our staff works together to keep the server fair, lively, and welcoming for every player.

members.name: Gandhi
members.description: Co-founder of Indus Realms, focused on long-term vision, community culture, and big feature decisions that shape the server.

members.name: Hulo
members.description: Co-founder who lives in the details ‚Äî balancing gameplay, progression, and events so every session feels fresh and engaging.

members.name: Cyclops
members.description: Owner & founder leading the realm from day one, making sure every update feels polished, stable, and fun for the whole community.

members.name: NEET
members.description: Backend wizard keeping performance, security, and uptime under control while supporting the rest of the staff behind the scenes.

members.name: Spirited
members.description: Friendly frontline support, answering questions, guiding new players, and keeping chat calm during busy hours.

members.name: Aizen
members.description: Sharp-eyed supporter watching over reports, tickets, and rule breaks to keep the server fair and enjoyable.

joinTeam.title: Want to Join Our Team?
joinTeam.description: We're always looking for dedicated players to join our staff team. Applications are reviewed regularly. Apply through our Discord server if you're interested!
